import React from 'react' import fridge1 from '../../Images/appliances/thor-cooktop.jpg' import fridge2 from '../../Images/appliances/whirlpool-cooktop.png' import Charges from '../../Sections/Charges'; import './Appliance.css' const RefrigeratorRepair = () => { return

Refrigerator and Freezer repair

The average lifespan of cooktops varies by type: electric cooktops typically last 13 to 15 years, gas cooktops about 15 years. Lifespan can be extended with regular maintenance and depends on factors like usage frequency, installation quality, and build quality.

At Major Appliance Repair, we're not just fixing appliances; we're restoring an essential part of your daily kitchen experience. Trust us to bring your cooktop back to its best with professionalism and care.

We will help you with:

Compressor Repairs

Thermostat Replacement

Leak Repairs

Defrosting Issues

Fan Motor Replacement

Door Seal Replacement

Coolant Recharging

Water Dispenser/Ice Maker Repair

Cleaning and Maintenance

And anything else!

What you can do before calling for service

Check Power Supply

Inspect the Thermostat

Listen for Unusual Noises

Check the Condenser Coils

Examine the Door Seals

Inspect the Evaporator Fan

Check the Compressor

Look at the Defrost System

Assess the Water Connection

Consult the User Manual

}; export default RefrigeratorRepair;
